title: cmd/go: ssl timeout?
body:
by **anwar.sky.sun**: 
Hello, all 
When I download the websocket, or the revel to go get command returns the connection
timeout, I'm sure the network is through; I do not know how to solve it.

[root@dnsserver google]# go get code.google.com/p/go.net/websocket
package code.google.com/p/go.net/websocket: Get
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/checkout?repo=net: dial tcp 74.125.31.113:443:
connection timed out
[root@dnsserver google]# go get github.com/robfig/revel
package code.google.com/p/go.net/websocket: Get
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/checkout?repo=net: dial tcp 74.125.31.102:443:
connection timed out
